title: The Ossians
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The tension of earlier had gone, or at least they'd all drunk enough to forget it for now. They were in the bar of the Thistle Hotel, a skanky old place dumped in the middle of smart, detached houses, with a gravel car park made for handbrake turns. The bar was filled with long-haired, thirty-something metalheads and pubescent nu-metal skate kids, all getting primed for the appearance of an AC/DC tribute band in the function room down the hall.
